      • openDatabase

        public BerkeleyJEKeyValueStore openDatabase(String name)
                                     throws StorageException
        Description copied from interface: KeyValueStoreManager
        Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.

        By default, the key length will be variable

        Specified by:
        openDatabase in interface KeyValueStoreManager
        Parameters:
        name - Name of database
        Returns:
        Database Handle

        ATTENTION: Invoking this method will delete ALL your data!!
